alert.note: Alert for Van Zandt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued June 14 at 5:59PM CDT until June 14 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN VAN ZANDT COUNTY... At 558 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Van, or 9 miles east of Canton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Van around 610 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Redland, Jones, Ben Wheeler, Primrose, Pruitt, Oakland and Colfax. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter now! Get to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building and avoid windows.
